titles.title: To ensure the equitable treatment of graduates of the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences of the Class of 1987.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 6/17/1999--Introduced. Requires an officer who entered the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences in 1983 and successfully completed instruction at such University in 1987 to be treated in the same manner as a student of the University who graduated in 1986 for purposes of determining pay and years of service, notwithstanding enactment of the Defense Officer Personnel Management Act.
